mapper.select: select c.courseId,t.teacherId,c.courseName,c.courseTime,c.credit,c.lessonType, t.teacherName,tc.lessonTime,tc.place,tc.isOpen from teacher t join teacher_course tc on t.teacherId=tc.teacherId JOIN course c on c.courseId=tc.courseId where t.teacherId=#{teacherId} order by tc.lessonTime limit #{page},#{size}
select count(*) from student s join student_course stc on s.studentId=stc.studentId where teacherId=#{teacherId} and courseId=#{courseId}
